programme.title: Drake Bell vs. Josh Peck
programme.desc: S1:E15 Everyone loved Drake & Josh but people don’t know the dark story behind the world’s favorite kids’ show. Josh struggled with his weight and addiction while filming the show. It was always painful for him to be the chubby sidekick to the cool, popular Drake. Then Josh shocked the world when he revealed that he and Drake weren’t even really friends. Drake was furious, sparking a massive backlash against Josh. But no one knew just how dark of a path Drake had gone down.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise of Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: S1:E2 Frank Shamrock was one of the toughest fighters to ever compete in the UFC. He holds the world record for the fastest consecutive knockouts, but his biggest fight happened when he was a child, living with his stepfather. His stepfather emotionally abused him so devastatingly, that even when Frank was sent to a Juvenile Detention Center, the other kids couldn’t believe what he went through. While many kids would be crushed under such pain and suffering, Frank Shamrock was determined to prove why warriors always find a way to win.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: Gwen Stefani vs. Gavin Rossdale
programme.desc: S1:E3 When Gwen Stefani’s happy 20-year relationship with Gavin Rossdale came crashing down, and she started dating Blake Shelton right after the divorce, the media went crazy. Discover the real story of the months of media torture Gwen had to go through, and where she is now in her new relationship with her new man.

programme.title: Britney Spears vs. Justin Timberlake
programme.desc: S1:E8 Did Britney Spears really cheat on Justin Timberlake? Britney and Justin were the perfect couple until she was accused of cheating on him after their breakup. Justin told the world his side of the story and the media believed him while Britney was mocked and silenced. The whole world watched as Britney went from being the media’s pop princess to spiralling in a very public meltdown, but what did Justin have to do with it? Our team uncovered the truth behind what really happened, and what Justin’s iconic Cry Me a River video has to do with Britney’s freedom.

programme.title: Kristen Stewart vs. Robert Pattinson
programme.desc: S1:E2 Every girl wanted to be Bella Swan in the blockbuster movie, Twilight. When Kristen Stewart auditioned and got the role, she fell in love with co-star Robert Pattinson shortly after, and the world became obsessed with the new young couple. But what Kristen didn’t expect was the endless media scrutiny, paparazzi following her entire life, and the endless craze from fans. After getting caught in a shocking scandal and being villainized by the entire world. But the media got her story wrongKristen had to embrace her authenticity to have the courage to be who she truly was regardless of what the world thought. We dug into Kristen and Roberts romance to find the real life story behind the tabloids.

programme.title: Nicole Kidman vs. Tom Cruise
programme.desc: S1:E9 Was Scientology the reason why Tom Cruise divorced Nicole Kidman? Nicole was obsessed with Tom. She tried to do everything she could to be with the superstar at all times. But Tom had another obsession: Scientology. Then, when Tom Cruise suddenly divorced Nicole, the world she thought she was living in shattered into a million pieces. Was it because of Scientology? Was it the multiple miscarriages she had? Was it the wiretap Tom allegedly put on Nicole? This story was so uncovered, that our team had to dig deep to get the details.

programme.title: Jennifer Aniston vs. Brangelina
programme.desc: S1:E12 For almost 20 years, the media portrayed Jennifer Aniston as a heartbroken woman who would never be happy until she had kids. That couldn’t be further from the truth. Our team uncovered details that will prove Brad and Jennifer were the perfect Hollywood couple everybody adored, until Brad suddenly left Jen for Angelina Jolie. This story is so much bigger than Brangelina.

programme.title: Real Stories: Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: UFC legend Frank Shamrock has a backstory you probably wouldn’t expect from one of the toughest fighters alive... As a kid, Frank Shamrock was the farthest thing from being a UFC legend—he was a criminal. He was put into Juvenile Detention Centers for all sorts of crimes, from damaging property to robbing stores. But there was a purpose to it. He wanted a way to escape the scary, torturously abusive home he grew up in, where his stepfather would make him do things that broke him physically and emotionally. But his tough, painful, and wildly unpredictable journey to becoming a UFC legend shows us success isn’t something that happens instantly, it’s a slow gradual process that’s reserved for those who don’t give up when things get hard.

programme.title: A Father's Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Should parents control their children or trust them to do the right thing?

programme.title: Deshauna Barber: From Soldier to Miss USA
programme.desc: When Army officer-turned-beauty queen Deshauna Barber takes the stage, her path in life is almost unbelievable. She shares the secrets that haunted her for years in this exclusive Goalcast Original.

programme.title: 10x Your Life
programme.desc: Author, entrepreneur, and sales savant, Grant Cardone, breaks down the power of his 10X Rule and how you can use it to multiply your success.

programme.title: Find Your Talent
programme.desc: Tom Bilyeu, co-founder of Quest Nutrition and co-founder & CEO of Impact Theory, reveals how this shift in mindset helped him find his passion.

programme.title: From Thief to Self-Made Millionaire
programme.desc: Watch John Assarafs personal story of growth, the lessons he learned early on in life, and how he went from robber to self-made millionaire by brushing his teeth.

programme.title: Amber Rose vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E5 it true that Kanye West was harassing Amber Rose when she suddenly left him? When Kanye West started dating Amber Rose, he took her from the life of being a stripper to the global superstar world. At first, they seemed like a couple that was truly in love. But when Amber suddenly left Kanye, his attitude towards her completely changed. Our team uncovered the real story behind the tabloids of the years of bullying, unwanted media attention, and attacks that Amber had to suffer. The true story will reveal why she was the special woman Kanye fell in love with in the first place, and what she and Kim Kardashian have in common.

programme.title: Drake Bell vs. Josh Peck
programme.desc: S1:E15 Everyone loved Drake & Josh but people don’t know the dark story behind the world’s favorite kids’ show. Josh struggled with his weight and addiction while filming the show. It was always painful for him to be the chubby sidekick to the cool, popular Drake. Then Josh shocked the world when he revealed that he and Drake weren’t even really friends. Drake was furious, sparking a massive backlash against Josh. But no one knew just how dark of a path Drake had gone down.

programme.title: Katy Perry vs. Russell Brand
programme.desc: S1:E7 Katy Perry is no stranger to toxic relationships. She finally thought she landed the perfect one with bad boy comedian Russell Brand, only for him to divorce her through text message right in the middle of her world tour 2 years later. Our team uncovered the full story of the turbulent aftermath and the journey she went on to become a strong, authentic person who was finally able to fully embrace a healthy relationship.

programme.title: Cameron Vs. Justin & Jessica
programme.desc: S1:E13 Cameron Diaz was one of the biggest stars in the world. So why did she leave it all behind? Our team uncovers a link between Cameron’s explosive breakup with Justin Timberlake and her choice to leave acting behind. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Cameron?Justin sparked cheating rumors when he moved on from Cameron 4 days later with Jessica Biel. Our team gets to the truth behind those rumors to reveal the role Justin played in Cameron disappearing and the truth is even more shocking…

programme.title: Gwen Stefani vs. Gavin Rossdale
programme.desc: S1:E3 When Gwen Stefani’s happy 20-year relationship with Gavin Rossdale came crashing down, and she started dating Blake Shelton right after the divorce, the media went crazy. Discover the real story of the months of media torture Gwen had to go through, and where she is now in her new relationship with her new man.

programme.title: Risks Threaten Retirement. Rewire Your Plans
programme.desc: "Tariffs, inflation, healthcare costs... how do you shift from saving to spending in retirement while managing risks like these? Jamie Hopkins is a CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER professional, an attorney, and best-selling author of Find Your Freedom and Rewirement: Rewiring the Way You Think About Retirement. He returns to the show , today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast 525 with Joe Anderson, CFP and Big Al Clopine, CPA to share insights on how to rewire your retirement plans. Plus, how should Fred and Ginger in Huntington Beach, California, pay for repairs on their rental properties? How can Peter Lemonjello manage taxes in his early retirement with 72(t) elections, rental income, and an installment sale? Can Calvin and Susie in Lancaster, Pennsylvania, buy an $800,000 beach house - and should they?"

programme.title: "Business ""Ethics"""
programme.desc: "It’s understandable that investors would like their money going towards companies that are (at the very least) TRYING to do the right thing, but unfortunately not many people really understand how these investments work, or how they could actually be making these problems a lot worse. So it’s time to learn How Money Works to find out why corporate ethics, is the second worst idea in business history."

programme.title: How Companies Cheated Price Fixing Laws
programme.desc: "Algorithms are everywhere. Every app, every website, EVERY business you interact with has a program working away in the background to show you what you want to see, get you to make decisions you didn’t have to, and make you spend as much as you’re absolutely willing to on stuff you didn’t know you needed…"

programme.title: "Destination Weddings, Gold Risks, and Economic Inequality"
programme.desc: "Financial advisor Ric Edelman reveals how a destination wedding can actually save money, discusses the dangers of investing in gold and explores the increasing economic inequality between black and white America with BET founder and entrepreneur Bob Johnson."

programme.title: "Dreams, Yachts, and Financial Failure"
programme.desc: Financial planner Ric Edelman discusses the determination needed to make your dreams come true - from the costs to purchase and maintain that dream yacht to the reality of owning your own restaurant and quizzes his audience about the most common reason for financial failure.

programme.title: Secure 2.0 Circus
programme.desc: Saving for retirement can be a bit of a three-ringed circus but Joe Anderson, CFP, and Big Al Clopine, CPA have your ticket to the show! Whether youre retired, saving for retirement, in the military, or paying off student loans, SECURE 2.0 is a massive shift in investment policy, designed to motivate and enable people to save more for retirement to the tune of $40 billion in new savings plans over the next decade not to mention reshaping 401(k)s and RMDs. What does the SECURE Act 2.0 mean for you? Its all under the big top in todays show!

programme.title: Should You Switch Retirement Contributions to Roth?
programme.desc: "Is it better to save for retirement in traditional 401(k)s and IRAs, or in Roth accounts? That s today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast 518 with Joe Anderson, CFP® and Big Al Clopine, CPA. Plus, what are the rules around contributing to two different types of Roth accounts? If required minimum distributions will be staggered because of a couple s age difference, should they convert their retirement savings to Roth, or leave it alone? But first, Joe and Big Al have a backdoor Roth conversion withdrawal debate to settle."

programme.title: How The Big Short Actually Worked
programme.desc: "The Big Short with its all star cast recounts the events of three groups of traders that bet against the housing market in the years before the sub prime mortgage crisis that would eventually result in the failure of key financial institutions. The Big Short is unique as a high budget Hollywood production that actually takes the time to properly portray the way that finance really worked behind the scenes and uses financial events to progress the plot rather than focusing on wild parties, sports cars and sexy ladies like some other movies that took a very different approach to storytelling. Similarly to the Wolf of Wall Street, the big short is a move based off a book only the wolf of wall street was an autobiography written by Jordan Belfort himself and The Big Short: Inside The Doomsday Machine, was a standard non-fiction title that described the role of several players in the creation of the credit default market betting against the American housing market. The Big Short was written by Michael Lewis, a veteran financial journalist and the book really does read like a 320-page financial article, in that its very information dense but also very well researched and verified. For this video we will only be looking at the players that are in the movie, but the book does go into detail on some people that were either entirely cut from the film or merged into other characters to make the movie entertaining to a broader audience. Unfortunately, in the process of making it appealing as possible to cinema goers the movie did cut out some very important details, and also just straight up got some things wrong. So, its time to lean How Money Works and give you guys the investment bankers insight into what really happened in the Big Short. "

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

Aspen HD
programme.desc: Tag along with Teton Gravity Research on a trip to Colorado, and watch as a crew throws down in Aspen, reaching the point where a jumping over a helicopter on a 95-foot jump is just another day.

programme.title: Mind The Gap
programme.desc: Join TGR and Anthill Films for a behind-the-scenes peek at the production and release of unReal, their 2015 mountain bike film.

programme.title: UTA: The Climb For Kosovo
programme.desc: In 2017, 34 year-old Uta Ibrahimi became the first person from Kosovo to attempt Everest. Born and raised in eastern Kosovo, her childhood was interrupted by a fierce ethnic war that ripped the heart out of the Balkan nation. Battling against Kosovo’s entrenched gender stereotypes and misogyny within the climbing community, Uta climbed the highest peaks in Kosovo, and then Europe.

programme.title: Homegrown Tour Guide
programme.desc: Get to know some of the coolest and most unique characters populating outdoors hubs around the country, and check out local favorite spots along the way.

programme.title: The KFC
programme.desc: The KFC - A Paragliding Adventure in Tanzania. Five Kiwis take a paragliding adventure in Tanzania, with the ultimate aim to fly from the summit of Mt Kilimanjaro.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking in Gaspésie, Québec
programme.desc: A massive and rugged peninsula surrounded by the Gulf of the St. Lawrence, Gaspésie features a dramatic coastline where beautiful wilderness rivers meet the ocean. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks around the iconic Percé Rock and stand up paddleboards the Bonaventure River.

programme.title: Alaska HD
programme.desc: Join Jeremy Jones, Sage Cattabriga-Alosa, Ian McIntosh, and Victoria Jealouse as they head to Alaska. Adverse snow conditions abound, but the experienced team manages to survive.

programme.title: Gunnie Season
programme.desc: The highly anticipated drop of 4bi9 Media’s “Gunnie Season” trailer is finally upon us. This is only 4bi9′s fourth feature length film, but you could consider them veterans in the game now. With a list of some of the top skiers in the world featured in their new film, it will be a must see. I recently sat down with the masterminds behind it all, AJ Dakoulas and Andrew Napier, and their assistant videographer/editor Kevin Steen for an interview about their season, and the making of Gunnie Season.

programme.title: The Mentor
programme.desc: Professional climber Marcus Garcia travels from his home in southwest Colorado’s San Juan Mountains to the limestone cliffs and spires of El Potrero Chico in northern Mexico to revisit his mentor’s final climb. In an emotional and powerful act of closure, he reflects on the accident that took him a decade to talk about—and climbs the route that took his mentor’s life.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Superbike
programme.desc: Get ready for the adrenaline-pumping action! Watch the electrifying moments from the MotoAmerica Superbike season opener at Barber Motorsports Park.

programme.title: FIM World SidecarCross
programme.desc: FIM Sidecar World Championship is the international sidecar racing championship. Round 9 takes place in the Strassbessenbach, Germany

programme.title: Masters GT Trophy
programme.desc: Catering for a wide variety of exciting GT cars that were eligible to enter GT4 race series as well as one-make CUP, Trophy and Challenge series from 2007-2018 inclusive.

programme.title: The Hell
programme.desc: A close up motorsport mini docuseries about racing on the worlds most prestigious racetrack.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Parts Unlimited Talent Cup by Motul
programme.desc: The future of American road racing is here. See the rising stars of the Parts Unlimited Talent Cup go head-to-head in Race 1 at Road America.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Parts Unlimited Talent Cup by Motul
programme.desc: These young racers are making big names for themselves. Race 2 at Road America saw bold passes and close finishes as the Talent Cup field proved why they’re the future of MotoAmerica.

programme.title: Classic Details
programme.desc: Today's show looks at a few classic details. Amy Alan has a serger lesson. She reviews the basic serger stitches and teaches when to use them and tension adjustments for each. Then, Angela Wolf introduces princess seams -- why you use them, how to adjust for fit, and then how to sew them. Finally, Kenneth D. King has a couture technique for curved tucks on a fabulous top.

programme.title: Fit and Flare
programme.desc: A classic style sometimes can use a change whether for fashion or fit. Fit expert Kathleen Cheetham teaches how to create a back yoke on a blouse to eliminate multiple darts or change to a more casual look. Then, it's a lesson on sleeves for your Little Black Dress with Angela Wolf. Finally, Gretchen Hirsch alters a favorite pattern by adding a flounce for a fashion flare.

programme.title: Tie It
programme.desc: Tie it all together with a color drop necklace with tied ribbon, a loomed mosaic bracelet using tile beads with Julianna Hudgins and a recycled tie, cuff bracelet featuring crystal with Laura Timmons.

programme.title: Trendspotting: Parachute Cord and Flowers
programme.desc: Using parachute cord in a whole new way, author Ashley Bunting adds beads from her stash to make a charming, colorful floral brooch. Katie rides the floral jewelry wave with pendants made with leather flowers, wire and crystals.

programme.title: Episode 11: Color Explosion
programme.desc: Add new life to the simplest designs. Ashley Horton adds splashes of color to highlight a page. Julie Fei-Fan Balzer explores the meaning of color with stamp rollers and watercolors. Ashley Horton has a tip for hand-stitching on scrapbook pages. Calligrapher Joanne Fink mixes it up with metallic inks.

programme.title: Time to Stop
programme.desc: It's time to make it artsy. Knowing when to stop is as important as starting. There are subtle cues to help you decide when your project is complete. First, we begin with white space. Host Julie Fei Fan Balzer shows you don't have to fill in the whole page when you're stenciling. You can train your eye to leave just the right amount of space. Then it's a faux encaustic technique with Seth Apter. You'll learn when to stop and when to keep going. Finally, Mary Hettmansperger shares design techniques for fabric and fiber.

programme.title: Knitting
programme.desc: Learn to knit with CraftsyTV.

programme.title: Knitting
programme.desc: Learn to knit with CraftsyTV.

programme.title: A Scrappy Stash-Buster Quilt Pattern
programme.desc: Do you experience stash-guilt? Well, Angela's got the cure with this scrappy stash-busting pattern.

programme.title: The Gunmen
programme.desc: Hoss and Little Joe are mistaken for bloodthirsty hired killers in a small Texas town dominated by two feuding families. Starring Michael Landon. Original broadcast date: January 23, 1960

programme.title: Daily News from Israel
programme.desc: A daily English-language newscast direct from the State of Israel

programme.title: Southern California Gems
programme.desc: Southern California performance artists explore Judaism in new ways, ancient Yiddish lyrics and the first Jewish women's theater. A Los Angeles drug treatment center may focus on Judaism but you don't have to be Jewish to find redemption.

programme.title: Pasternak Restaurant, Berlin
programme.desc: Actor Mike Burstyn and Perla Karney meet at Pasternak Restaurant in Berlin to kibbitz in Yiddish and enjoy many classic Jewish Russian dishes, including pulke or roasted stuffed chicken thigh, veal roulade, borscht, beef stroganoff, blinis, and more.

programme.title: Hasidic Brooklyn's Local Economy
programme.desc: Frieda Vizel, raised as a member of the Satmar Hasidic Community, give us an inside look at the unique local economy in Hasidic Williamsburg Brooklyn, taking us on a walking tour through this very large Orthodox Jewish neighborhood.

programme.title: Tour of the South
programme.desc: A Cordon Bleu-trained Houston chef keeps his family's deli legacy alive. Meet a New Orleans king of bourbon whose passion is helping others and Vicksburg's beloved matriarch who's keeping the only temple open with help from her Christian friends.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 2
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. programme.title: Castle Down
programme.desc: Sneevil and Biggs dig tunnels underneath the Castle that bring it crashing down underground. Melody and Nardy must face their fears and work together to bring the Castle back up to Smightyland.

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: LOTTERY
programme.desc: Chai Raja buys a lottery ticket from a ticket seller who passes by. Chai Raja dreams of him in a 7 storeyed teashop, with many Sundars cleaning and serving around. Getting out of his dream, Chai Raja writes down the number on the wall and hands the ticket to Sundar. Sundar, caught up in his chores tucks it away in his tent but forgets about it. Next day Sundar look at the newspaper and is stunned to see that the ticket has won the prize!Sundar searches high and low inside his paraphernalia, watched by Basha till he finally finds it in his tent. Sundar lapses into a day-dream in which he owns the 7 storeyed teashop with Chai Raja at his service and Basha cleaning around. However, Basha pokes his tail popping the dream and dashes off with the ticket. A mad chase, ensues as Sundar tries to get back the ticket. Basha wants the ticket for himself so that his own dream may come true that of being the owner of the 7 storeyed teashop with bananas all around and Chai Raja, his personal chef. (Sundar will be the entertainment). The chase starts now for the ticket. Chai Raja has no clue as to what is happening. As the chase happens, the greedy customers want to get their hands on it as well. The ticket finally falls and there is a pile-up outside the shop as everyone dives for it. Sundar emerges, dishevelled and bruised but holding the ticket- only to have it chewed by a nanny goat! By then Chai Raja arrives at the scene realizing what just happened.

programme.title: Tota Raja
programme.desc: Chai Raja adopts a parrot (without a cage) who suddenly considers himself master of the cafe. Sundar now has to take orders from the parrot, who assumes the role of Chai Rajas second-in-command. Sundar detests the parrot but has to take good care of him to make Chai Raja happy. Basha decides to take advantage. He drops water on the parrot and the blame falls on Sundar. The parrot makes Sundars life miserable and Basha too gets caught in the parrots wrath. Sundar and Basha team up and find a way to make Chai Raja fire the parrot.

programme.title: You're All Useless!
programme.desc: Negu is sick and tired of Amkko, Koto and Mei’s uselessness and kicks them out. The Guardians try to teach them to behave properly so they can fit in in the Yan World, but the Mutants are the worst students ever. Negu sends them a message saying that if they snatch the Glove of the North, he’ll take them back, so Mei tricks the Guardians into taking them to the Magic Fort and tries to steal the glove. Everyone is relieved that the Mutants are back to normal.

programme.title: THE TROJAN HEDGEHOG
programme.desc: The Guardians each come up with a gift for Maestra Saku’s birthday. A mysterious wooden hedgehog shows up as a gift, which proves to have Koto and Amkko inside! They attack the Magic Fort, but are thwarted by the Guardians when Xia bluffs about the dangers of his gift.

programme.title: Country Mouse and City Mouse
programme.desc: Country Mouse GoGo receives a letter from his urban friend UGo, and leaves for the city.

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: Tarot Tales
programme.desc: A fake yogi loses his forecasting parrot and is in search for a replacement. As he passes by GrandPA’s house he sees Keet and wants him as his fortune telling parrot.

programme.title: Shivery Timbers
programme.desc: Mildred the ghost has had just about enough of the Creepy Candys noisy shenanigans and wants the library quiet.It is then the Creepy Candy find a secret treasure map and decide to follow it. The clues lead our daring swashbucklers on a high seas adventure of danger and mystery.Will they discover a hidden treasure? What will it begold, jewels, chocolate? Will Mildred ever be happy? Watch this exciting episode of Shivery Timbers and find out!

programme.title: FIRST COME FIRST SERVE
programme.desc: Sundar wakes up late and finds a glaring Chai Raja stand towering over him. He rushes to take his station as business begins but alas his headache is about to get much worse for Basha has decided to sabotage each and every customer who walks in Chai Rajas door that day. To make matters worse, a wrestler turns up at the shop and demands that he be the one to be served first always. Chai Rajas rhythm is distorted by the wrestlers hankering and all goes for a toss. Basha disguises and manages to grab the wrestlers attention who now demands that Sundar serve Basha. But Sundar finds out its Basha and chases him. The lovestruck wrestler, woebegone at losing his love punches Sundar into orbit while Basha looks on gleefully.

programme.title: Shapeshifter
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Prince Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy discovers that he may be next in line to the throne of a tiny faraway country – and he takes a crash-course in ‘how to be royal’... with ‘crash’ being the key word!

programme.title: ICE ATTACK
programme.desc: The Elders confiscate the Guardians’ weapons until they learn to value each other. Negu sends Ice Poppy, a cute mutant who can shoot ice and freeze you if you look in her eyes. Valuing each other, the Guardians defeat Ice Poppy and earn their weapons back.

programme.title: Non Stop Dance Party
programme.desc: Melody creates a tune so catchy that she puts all the Smighties into a trance. Its up to her to now save the day and stop the villains with her powerful music.

programme.title: Hamster in the House.
programme.desc: Friendly and lovable ‘mad scientist’ Granny Peters accidentally transforms her cute little pet hamster.... into a not-so-cute HUGE pet hamster – and things get interesting when it escapes and decides to move into Gummy’s place uninvited.

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: SUNDAR SANTA
programme.desc: Its Christmas and Chai Raja makes Sundar lug in a mini-tree as a decorative centrepiece for the special day (decorations are beautifully coloured snacks on a tree made of green chillies). His job profile also includes handing out small gifts from below the tree to the regular patrons of the shop. Sundar loyally goes on with his chores trying his best to sweeten up the Chai experience for the clientele with his Christmassy cheer. Basha, feeling some of the joy of giving himself, decides to give Sundar off from chasing and turns up at the shop with merely the intention of watching the celebration. Sundar however pranks Basha with a rigged gift giving the latter a sore spot on his behind. Now it is officially revenge and Basha decides to spoil Sundars day. What follows next is when Basha comes in various Christmas diguises as a variety of santas, as einderretc thus stealing the gifts, food and also making Sundars life a living hell. The Christmas is not emrry anymore for Sundar.

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: The Easter Episode
programme.desc: Wheres the Easter Bunny? And what are chocolate bunny eggs? Gummy and Friends are about to find out

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: CHAI-CE CREAM
programme.desc: It is a hot summer day and the customers are sweating. Chai Raja and Sundar are trying hard to keep them cool. To make matters worse a group of school students come with their class teacher as a part of their picnic. And the same time an ice-cream seller comes in front of the shop. Delighted, all the customers and the students flock around him to buy ice-cream. Chai Raja and Sundar are instantly out of customers and business. Totally frustrated, Chai Raja appoints Sundar to canvas the customers back to the hotel. Sundar tries to do some stupid performances to lure the kids back. But things take a twist when Basha teams up with the ice-cream seller. Now it is full on competition. And lets see who wins!

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can’t decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only “cleaned” Charlie’s wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy’s yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: Who Ate it?
programme.desc: There’s one last donut in the house – and 3 hungry donut lovers... each one of them determined that no one (other than them) gets it!

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Robot Maid
programme.desc: GrandPA gets a big courier box at his doorstep voila ! it’s a robot maid and she is very efficient in the house within minutes she sparkles the house.

programme.title: DAMSEL DISTRESS
programme.desc: Sundar is dusting the shop in the morning just before service when out of a wallet falls an old photo of a pretty girl. Grinning, Sundar shoves it in front of Chai Raja. Chai Raja taken aback at the photo sighs and looks lovelorn for a second- then shoves the wallet and photo out of sight. Sundar is distracted by another of naughty Bashas antics and doesnt think much of it until there is a swish of unusual colour at the door entrance. And there she stands! Chai Rajas old army crush! Chai Raja is at first stunned but surprise turns to shock when she holds out an invitation- for her newly opening snack shop, right next door. Chai Raja starts sweating and Sundar understands the cause for her consternation soon enough when the next day Chaha Devi (what she calls herself) opens her stand. Its a runaway hit! She is a Bharatnatyam dancer and cooks a meaner batch of fries than Chai Raja dancing bharatnatyam while she cooks so good that not only Chai Rajas clientele is wooed away, but so is Basha! There starts a hilarious and amusing dance off between Chai Raja and Chaha Devi. Chai raja is torn between anger and admiration and its all left to Sundar to salvage Hotel Californias future..and for that may need Bashas help!

programme.title: A Rodent Fix
programme.desc: Don has a new and yummy kitchen garden. And a new thief too! For the first time, don and the rats join hands to catch the unwanted intruder. And it is indeed a veggie mess all around.

programme.title: The Lost Lagoon
programme.desc: After spilling juice on mom’s blanket and not fessing up, Odessa feels guilty. In the Zooniverse, she offers to lead her friends to a lagoon to watch a butterfly dance but doesnt speak up when she loses the map. Never give up, try your hardest, and always tell the truth!

programme.title: Bobby's Day Out
programme.desc: The loose motion has caught on to Cat, when he agrees to babysit his neighboring cat Katreena’s neice for the afternoon.

programme.title: Sleepy Colonel
programme.desc: It is a sleep deprived Colonel and a caring bro Don who would do anything to make his big bro sleep. And there is Larry, Marly and Charly who scream the life out of Colonel. It is a war for a little calm slumber. And the brothers realize that, with the rats around, it is an impossible thing to get.

programme.title: Bird House
programme.desc: Dunky has just finished making a nice bird house for the new pigeon family and their new babies. The new family is grateful and Keet is their chosen godmother.

programme.title: Hopeless Dreams
programme.desc: Cat is taking a cat nap as Keet flies in and bangs a pan on Cats head and wakes him up. Cat gets up in a start and amazed by what he sees.

programme.title: THAT SINKING FEELING
programme.desc: Mei decides to impress Negu with an art museum. He has the Rock-Eating Mutant pull down old buildings to build the museum. The Guardians’ “island” starts to sink. Pai “fishes” for the cause of the sinking and pulls up the Mutant, whom they entice to eat something besides rocks.

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: What a mess!
programme.desc: The twins meet a girl who lost the key to her bike lock because she’s so untidy.

programme.title: Golden Eggs
programme.desc: Hoodie has his eyes on the hens eggs in GrandPAs farm. Keet has saved them once but is sure Hoodie will try again.

programme.title: The Controllator
programme.desc: Everyone has forgotten April’s birthday, so when a stranger gives her a present, she’s delighted to accept it. It’s one of Negu’s inventions, which makes her do things against her will. When April, controlled by Negu, manages to steal the Glove of the North, Pai and Xia prove that they had remembered her birthday really, and get April to remove the device that’s control her.

programme.title: The Secrets of the Engine
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: Harold's Missing Spoon
programme.desc: On a gusty day, Pancake has lost his favorite hat, and he’s looked EVERYWHERE, finally giving up and thinking maybe someone snatched it – Maple. The younger otter denies it (despite a history of “borrowing” stuff from Pancake and not putting any of it back), but Pancake doesn’t believe her. He goes to sleep thinking his little sister has his hat.When he arrives in the Zooniverse, he finds the Zoonicorns are in the midst of a Harold Crisis: the bear has lost one of his prized spoons!

programme.title: BABY DRAGON
programme.desc: Xia tries to master his transformation into the Dragon Warrior. Negu sends a Mutant Dragon, who decides Xia would be a perfect baby for her. April and Pai get the Mutant Dragon to fall in love with their dragon-shaped ship, the Lord of the Wind.

programme.title: Alone Again Unnaturally
programme.desc: When Pancake goes away to summer camp, Maple has no one to play with. In the Zooniverse, the Zoonicorns are gone as well, and she must team up with Harold to find them! Always be willing to make new friends.

programme.title: Double Role
programme.desc: ‘Ting tong’ .. Cat opens the door to sees a milk bowl at the door step. He slurps it up and ‘ZAP’ a Cat clone is formed.

programme.title: Field Trip Fiasco
programme.desc: The bros set out for a trip to the great Qutab Minar. And they make sure that they got rid of the rat trio before entering. But Larry Charly and Marly are way too smarter than any of us. To make matters worse, they bombard the entire structure and put the blame on Don and Colonel. Will they ever escape this??

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: The Tortoise and the Hare
programme.desc: The Hare, the fastest animal in the woods, and the tortoise, the slowest, compete in a race.

programme.title: The Lightning Strikes
programme.desc: Its raining heavily and the three are nicely tucked in the sofa and watching a tv show as the tv goes out.

programme.title: A Slice Of Fun
programme.desc: Ding Dong. It’s the pizza delivery boy. Don pays the cash and open’s the box to find only leftover olives and baby corn! Sad and dejected, he decides to make his own pizza, but is tricked by Lary Marly and Charly as always!

programme.title: KING SCUMWORM
programme.desc: Peng’s carelessness leads to the Ninjas fighting their way out of the nest of a huge (but dopey) parasitic monarch.

programme.title: XIA’S BAD DREAM
programme.desc: Xia becomes over-confident after he pulls off an impossible move invented by the Elders. But in his dreams, he keeps losing to mutants! April and Xia have to go into his nightmare and give him advice to conquer his dream enemies.

programme.title: Gelatina
programme.desc: It is Fridays “Date of Manufacture” (birthday), and Fred tries to make it great. Brains has an emergency when her old, and difficult-to-control pet comes to find her. Gelatina is a gooey blob who can morph into any disguise.

programme.title: The New Otter In Town
programme.desc: After thinking that his mother doesnt know what its like to be a kid, in the Zooniverse, Pancake becomes friends with a fun otter kid - who turns out to be his mom!. Judging people/People are often more than what they seem

programme.title: Charlie’s Castle
programme.desc: It’s Uncle Charlie’s birthday and the twins have surprised him with a nap mask and breakfast, but the twins want to celebrate a little more by throwing a party and inviting all their friends. Although Charlie wishes to have a more peaceful celebration, he gives in to the pleas of Boris and Sandy. After getting a hint from Charlie on how much he loves chess, boris and sandy plan the birthday party around a ‘knights and castles’ theme. The twins get Deedee to bring balloons, a castle cake with turrets from Tiggy and a jousting dance from Mewmew. Boris and Sandy set out to decorate Uncle Charlie’s house, just in time for their friends coming in with all the goodies for the party. They even invent a balloon jousting game between Deedee and Mewmew that makes Mewmew crash into Tiggy’s cake and thereby wreck all the arrangements much to the dismay of the twins. This calls for Deedee’s magic where all the party ingredients are put into a large purple cauldron and it makes a gigantic bouncing castle in the chequerboard garden. And the snoring sounds lead them to find Uncle Charlie napping right inside it. They bounce around Uncle Charlie as much as they can and then wind down for a long snooze. Uncle Charlie awakes to happily find that the twins have organised his most best birthday slumber party ever.

programme.title: Rest-O-War
programme.desc: A cookbook open on his left, and tears in his eyes as Don chops onions. Colonel is the new restaurateur, and Don the head chef. All the food is being diverted into the trio tummies. Frustrated of waiting, would the customers ever be served?

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: CHICKEN!
programme.desc: To earn his Orange Underbelt, Pai thinks he’s going to fight Xia in a chicken costume. But he ends up having to fight Negu’s giant chicken mutant, which can fire toxic eggs!

programme.title: Moon Charmer
programme.desc: Samir the local snake charmer is trying unsuccessfully to charm a snake out of his basket and the market is growing restless until Jamillah arrives and all of the market is in awe! When she explains where she comes from Samir is thrilled and asks her to accompany him to see a rare astrological site, a blood moon. But its a sight best seen from above and the greatest viewing spots are outside the city gates which are locked at night not to mention the law expressly forbidding anyone to leave. When they try to leave via a secret door a guard catches them, but just when all hope seems lost Jamillah has an idea - the magic carpet! And with that they take off into a night sky filled with a big red moon.

programme.title: 1,2,3… Smile~
programme.desc: Duda discovers Dadas digital camera. Suddenly, he becomes hooked on taking photos. Scot shows up thinking they are going on a picnic. But, he finds out that they are going swimming in the lake instead. Ashamed of not knowing how to swim, Scot tries to practice in a kiddie pool when no one is around. Unfortunately, Duda captures Scots embarrassing moment on camera. Afraid that Duda will show the photo to others, Scot is determined to delete it at all costs. After losing his boat to Duda in a bet, Scot becomes frantic when he sees his friends taking a ride on it with Duda and his camera. Without thinking, Scot jumps into the lake to go after them. Will Scot be okay?

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Colonel buys a brand new car and brings it to show off to his bro Don. But Larry Marly and Charly would just not let it happen. The dog bros put their lives in danger to save the shiny four wheeler. But alas! All that is left of the car is its crumpled skeleton. Thank God the rats spared their lives!

programme.title: SWITCHING PLACES
programme.desc: After arguing about whose avatar is more difficult to control, Xia and April swap magic accessories. Xia becomes the Panther Warrior and April becomes the Dragon Warrior. Unfortunately, just as they’re struggling to control each other’s avatars, Negu’s latest mutant attacks: his beloved pet “cat,” Kanna. The Guardians manage to capture Kanna, so Mei, Koto, and Amkko race to the Yan World to retrieve her – which is just what the Guardians want!

programme.title: Super Gummy
programme.desc: Accidentally convinced that he’s a super hero, Gummy becomes Mind-O-Man – and sets out to help out everybody... to the point of driving them CRAZY!

programme.title: The Talking Treasure Bird
programme.desc: A traveller comes into town with a special bird that can lead them to treasure which Aladdin desperately wants but cant afford. Jamillah arrives and offers 5 gold chocolate coins which the traveller gladly accepts. They take him home and try to make him talk, calling upon Genie to help out. They succeed but the bird is only interested in worms not treasure although he gives them a riddle to help them find it. After a mad dash through the market they find it only to discover that treasure doesnt mean the same thing to everyone!

programme.title: The Supreme Law – Simbad
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, the elf Fo, travel into the story of Sinbad the Sailor, having been called out by PRINCESS ARIBA, the daughter of the GRAND CALIPH. There, they learn that the intrepid sailor has been arrested by the VIZIER, accused of having broken a supreme law: lying to the Grand Caliph, when recounted the stories of his incredible voyages to him. Unless someone does something, SINBAD will be executed in 12 hours’ time. SANDRA and FO must find irrefutable proof that the wonders described by SINBAD are true, while at the same time escaping from the claws of the evil VIZIER.

programme.title: Shhh~ It`s a Secret
programme.desc: The gang is exploring the flowers, but Duda wants to explore something more exciting. He learns about Wibbly-Wobbly Cliff and becomes animated with interest. Unfortunately, Dada tells him not to go there alone because its dangerous. Despite Dadas warnings, Duda persuades Caber to go to the cliff with him. They discover a treasure in a cave but are afraid to upset Dada and promise to keep their find a secret from each other. Duda has a hard time keeping his secret and accidentally lets it slip to Piggy, Puggy and Bubble. Soon, everyone puts the pieces together and goes to find Duda and Caber. Meanwhile, Duda and Caber are in the treasure cave playing with their treasure. However, instead of having fun they seem a little sad...

programme.title: Like A Bridge Over Troubled Teeter Totters
programme.desc: Pancake helps the Zoonicorns “imagine” a bridge across the Sticky-Icky River, but it comes out completely wrong, and he must learn not to give up and that just because something ended up a bit different than planned that it still can’t do the job. Don’t give up if something doesn’t go exactly as planned; keep trying and be creative.

programme.title: Take A Dance On Me
programme.desc: Pancake is terrible dancer, and when he joins the Zoonicorns in their dances to make flowers bloom, his issues could disrupt springtime. You dont have to be perfect at something to enjoy it.Feelings are as important as skills.

programme.title: The Vegetarians
programme.desc: We start the episode with Cat holding an upset stomach and at doctors place with Dunky and Keet. The doctor tells him he cannot have non veg and should be on a veg diet.

programme.title: You Can Leave Your Hat Off
programme.desc: When Odessa doesnt want to get rid of her old coat, now to small, because shes had it forever (and is a little afraid of change), but when she ends up helping Ene find a hat, she learns that change isnt something to be afraid, but something to be embraced. Change can be good

programme.title: Genesis
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Fly-Away Nightingale
programme.desc: Whilst picking some fruit, Aladdin accidentally lets the Sultans precious nightingale go free. Genie is convinced that he can call him back using a spell but he cant remember where it is, so Jamillah and Aladdin run after it. They chase the bird to the market where he lands on a traders stall and Jamillah must outwit the trader using her modern phone to get him back. Finally Jamillah and Aladdin call Genie to use the magic carpet to retrieve it and Genie remembers the right spell just in time.

programme.title: Mango Season
programme.desc: It’s the mango season and Dunky has to guard all the mangoes so that no one will steal them. He has taken the help of Cat and Keet to guard them from Hoodie and the mean cat gang.

programme.title: Fruits Of The Forest – Little Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Detective Sandra and her assistant Fo go to the tale of Little Red Riding Hood, having been called out by the Grandmother, whose knitting needles have mysteriously gone missing. Shortly after they arrive, and without Sandra realising it, the Wolf captures Fo and takes him to his lair in order to devour him. While Fo desperately uses his ingenuity - and a cookery book – to avoid becoming the wolf’s dinner, Sandra gets down to work in search of the knitting needles. The investigation will lead the detective to the Wolf’s lair, and thus she saves Fo. Sandra will also discover that Little Red Riding Hood and the Wolf have reached an agreement to hide the knitting needles, because Little Red Riding Hood is sick of wearing the red hoods her grandmother knits for her.

programme.title: Ámame como soy
programme.desc: Dasha, una rica chica mimada, pierda la memoria en un accidente planeado por su novio y su mejor amiga.

programme.title: Ámame como soy
programme.desc: Dasha, una rica chica mimada, pierda la memoria en un accidente planeado por su novio y su mejor amiga.

programme.title: Ámame como soy
programme.desc: Dasha, una rica chica mimada, pierda la memoria en un accidente planeado por su novio y su mejor amiga.

programme.title: Ámame como soy
programme.desc: Dasha, una rica chica mimada, pierda la memoria en un accidente planeado por su novio y su mejor amiga.

programme.title: Caminando hacia el amor
programme.desc: Para salvar su museo, una conservadora curadora se aliará con un artista que es lo contrario a ella.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Investigative reporter Joshua Philipp examines the deeper meaning behind the day's news.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Outside The Box
programme.desc: A talk show tackling major news topics Al Arabiya-style.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Sabah Al Arabiya
programme.desc: Start the day afresh with Al Arabiya’s morning show, equipping viewers with social and cultural news, a regional press review and sports and weather updates.

programme.title: Ely Bali Balak
programme.desc: Director: Wael Ehsaan - Cast: Mohamed Saad / Abla Kamel - Year of production: 2003_x000D_ يقوم اللمبى بسرقة حقيبة عمه، بحثا عن اوراق التى تثبت احقيته فى ميراث ابيه، تقوم الشرطة بالقبض عليه ويودع السجن، وهناك يكتشف أن المأمور رياض المنفلوطى يشبهه فى الملامح، ينجح اللمبى فى الهروب من السجن، فيقرر رياض مطاردته بنفسه، يحدث صدام بين الدراجة البخارية التى يقودها اللمبى وبين سيارة رياض، وتجرى لهما عملية، يتم نقل مخ اللمبى الى جسد رياض المنفلوطي، ويستغل الضابط ادهم هذه الفرصة من اجل اطلاق سراح سجين وتهريبه خارج مصر مقابل مبلغ كبير من المال. يجد اللمبى نفسه وقد عاش فى بيت المأمور الراحل، ومع زوجته فيحاء، وابنته اشكيناز، ويبدأ فى التحول الى شخص مسئول، يسعى الى القبض على السجين الهارب واعادته الى السجن، تكتشف فيحاء الحقيقة، وانها احبت اللمبي، الذى تصدمه سيارة ويصبح شخصا ثالثاً.

programme.title: Al Mash Mohandis Hassan
programme.desc: Director: Manal Al Sefe - Cast: Mohammad Rajab /Dolly Shahen - Year of production: 2008

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Felix in Fairyland-1923
programme.desc: Felix is reading a book about Fairyland, and decides that it must be a wonderful place to be. Suddenly he hears a cry for help, and finds a fly stuck on a piece of flypaper. He rescues the insect, only to have it turn into a beautiful fairy princess who, in gratitude for his help, grants him one wish. He wishes he were in Fairyland, and is immediately transported there.

programme.title: A Ham in a Role 1949
programme.desc: A Shakespearian dog, tired of being a pie-in-the-face looney tune, quits Warner Brothers to study dramatic acting and goes to his country house to practice the bard. programme.desc: Popeye has beaten Bluto to a date with Olive. Seeing that Olive is superstitious, Bluto changes the date to Friday the 13th, and proceeds to rig various proofs that bad things will happen if she goes out.

programme.title: Assault and Flattery 1956
programme.desc: Bluto is accusing Popeye in judge Wimpy's courtroom. Bluto tells a sad tale of how Popeye attacked him without provocation, but Popeye tells his side, in detail (in other words, a large chunk of _Balmy Swami, A (1949)_)

programme.title: Rocket Bye Baby 1956
programme.desc: A cosmic mix-up results in a Martian baby being delivered to Earth, while an Earth baby is sent to Mars. Joseph Wilbur and his wife try to raise the green-skinned, ingenious Martian tyke as if he were an Earthling. But the kid builds his own spaceship and flies away, and Wilbur must find him and bring him back, or he'll never be able to make an exchange with the Martian parents for his own boy.

programme.desc: Clay objects of all sizes, shapes and colors contort and reshape themselves to a jazz music score.

programme.title: A Haunting we Will Go 1949
programme.desc: Casper the Friendly Ghost, sad that he can make no friends since everyone he meets is afraid of him, hatches an abandoned egg and becomes the emerging little duck's best friend and protector.

programme.title: Greek Mirthology 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is trying to get his nephews to eat their spinach, so he tells them about how Hercules (Popeye) defeated a bully (Bluto). Hercules gets his strength by sniffing garlic; he wins numerous tests of strength against the bully until the bully spots him sniffing garlic. The bully pulls out a handy bottle of chlorophyll and douses the garlic, disabling Hercules. He then knocks him into a field of spinach where Hercules discovers a new and better source of strength.

programme.title: Back Stage-1923
programme.desc: The gang operates a donkey-propelled tour bus. Later, a cut-rate vaudeville producer hires them to help out with his show, which they wreck.

Born to Battle -1935
programme.desc: Good-natured troublemaker "Cyclone" Tom Saunders is hired by a ranchers' association manager to investigate recent cattle rustling at one of their ranches and to see if a pair of nesters have anything to do with it. After discovering the nesters, pretty Betty Powell and her rickety old father, are incapable of rustling, Tom instead turns his attention to the huge, swaggering bully of a foreman, Nate Lenox.

programme.title: This program is brought to you by
Born to the Saddle 1951
programme.desc: When a young man agrees to race a wonderful quarter horse, a crooked, wife abusing, gambler has plans to sabotage the contest.

programme.title: Boothill Brigade -1937
programme.desc: Rancher Reynolds has fired his men and hired killers and is now using a crooked land deal to put the other ranchers off their land. Calico finds the reason why when he runs into his old nemesis Porter.

programme.title: Blazing Frontier 1943
programme.desc: In the 19th and last of the PRC "Billy the Kid" series (first six with Bob Steele and last 13 with Buster Crabbe), a feud develops between the settlers and the railroad detectives in Red Rock Valley. Clem Barstow sends for Billy the Kid and Fuzzy Jones to help. Buster suspects that Ward Tragg, chief of the railroad detectives, and Luther Sharp, land agent for the Western Railroad Company, are defrauding the settlers without the knowledge or sanction of the company. Billy and the settlers rustle off cattle, which have been illegally confiscated by Tragg and his men, in order to raise money for Barstow to bid on a ranch which Sharp is illegally auctioning off. Billy discovers that the purchase price on the deed has been altered and Barstow writes the company to send a man to investigate. When Tragg learns about this, he makes plans to kidnap the railroad official.

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: ARI GLOBAL - LA PERIODISTA QUE TE CAMBIARÁ LA MIRADA SOBRE LOS FAMOSOS
programme.desc:
En este episodio entrevistamos a Ari Global, nacida entre el prestigioso medio de comunicación venezolano "Cisneros Media" ahora dedica su vida al periodismo, la periodista nos cuenta cómo es entrevistar a las celebridades más famosas y cuál cree que sea el secreto de su éxito. Además hablamos de su libro en donde narra en primera persona muchas de estas entrevistas.
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada JUEVES por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: MARAVILLA MARTÍNEZ - CUÁNDO SERÁ SU ÚLTIMA VEZ EN EL RING?
programme.desc:
En nuestro primer episodio hablamos con Maravilla Martínez acerca de su carrera, sus comienzos, su presente, los desafíos atravesados en el camino, las terapias alternativas como las regresiones a vidas pasadas y mucho más!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada JUEVES por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: Concierto Poético de Laura Chimaras: 6 Poemas de Amor y Vida | Música en Vivo | Memorias
STEPHANIE CARRILLO: "La maternidad transformó mi vida" | La generación del Cambio - Episodio 3
programme.desc:
En este episodio tenemos a Stefi Carrillo, quien nos comparte un testimonio conmovedor de resiliencia y lucha. Su maternidad, resultado de un tratamiento de fertilización in vitro, marcó un nuevo capítulo lleno de desafíos y alegrías. Con dos mellizas y una carrera exitosa, Stefi demuestra que con fe, apoyo y determinación, es posible equilibrar sueños profesionales y la vida personal.
Este es un llamado a todas las mujeres para que, con valentía, sigan adelante enfrentando los desafíos, se cuiden y celebren sus logros, porque, como dice Stefi, reconocer nuestro propio valor es parte esencial de ese camino. Roche nos motiva a formar parte de la Generación del Cambio.

programme.title: MELINA VICARIO: “No existe cura sin el miedo al diagnóstico” | La generación del Cambio - Episodio 4
programme.desc:
En el último episodio de Agente del Cambio, Meli Vicario nos regala una poderosa lección de vida, compartiendo su historia de lucha, esperanza y superación. Nos recuerda la importancia de escuchar nuestro cuerpo, de nunca rendirnos y de ser tenaces cuando buscamos respuestas para nuestra salud y nuestra vida.
A través de su experiencia, Meli hace un llamado a todas las personas, y nos recuerda que, aunque los diagnósticos pueden ser difíciles y los caminos inciertos, nunca debemos dejar de buscar respuestas ni permitir que nuestra voz se apague.
Roche, nos motiva a formar parte de la Generación del Cambio, un movimiento que invita a levantar la voz, compartir nuestras historias, y luchar por una atención médica más equitativa y accesible para todos.

programme.title: Don't Tap Out Tap In
programme.desc: What are you really fighting? In “Don’t Tap Out Tap In,” Pastor Steven Furtick reveals that God is waging war with what’s coming against you — because the fruit is coming!

programme.title: Think Like A Reaper
programme.desc: In “Think Like A Reaper,” Pastor Steven Furtick shows us how to think about the outcome while living in the fear, frustration, and fatigue of right now. You’ll be encouraged that God is with you in your hard place, and help is closer than you realize.

programme.title: This Is What A Miracle Feels Like
programme.desc: Sometimes, a miracle feels like you’re free, but you’re still running. Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us to look for signs that God is at work when our feelings haven’t caught up to our reality in “This Is What A Miracle Feels Like.”

programme.title: Running For A Reason
programme.desc: Our expectation of God must not be that there will never be anything chasing us in life but that we are chosen while we are chased. In “Running For A Reason,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that even though God has placed something significant in us, certain development can only happen in the caves of our lives.

programme.title: Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief
programme.desc: The belief that we need something other than God is what keeps us from going through breakthroughs. That’s how we can be in covenant with God but still in captivity. In “Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief,” Pastor Steven Furtick helps us break up with what’s been holding us back.
